item.title: GCMA: Guaranteed Contiguous Memory Allocator
item.description: GCMA (Guaranteed Contiguous Memory Allocator) is a contiguous memory allocator for Linux kernel that guarantees fast latency, success of allocation, and reasonable system memory utilization. Our evaluation on Raspberry Pi 2 shows 15 to 130 times faster and more predictable allocation latency without system performance degradation compared to Linux v3.18 default CMA.
